intro:
openminded, curious. nerd at heart. love to connect to other people. there are no boundaries. this is a new world. let us discover and share our thoughts. learn, grow, love and accept differences to find ways to end darkness and loneliness.

enjoy life - together

post.body: Who wants to exchange some drug experiences? Open to anything...

comment.body:
can recommend https://bitcoin.de/
whole site is based on bank transfer model - many options to filter sellers / buyers - good reputation system
another site which worked flawless: https://anycoindirect.eu/

Awful German kid :( a shame on him... Keep in mind: this is a minority of people. peace & love to all of us. Lets please stop talking about nations and borders - lets focus on ending the suffering we experience on so many levels. Dream of forgiving, loving and helping each other!
